Blog.post: current mood: tired.. todae seem to work out pretty well.. had fun in claz.. there was some arguement goin on... luckily i was not involved.. bein da busy body tt i m.. i poked in.. poke?? correct word usage?? ah nvm.. aniways.. i started addin in... wait..b4 i continue.. heres the arguement 'SA' says: " u all everytim put da projects at my hse.. then expect mi to bring..." 'SW' says: " bud u agree n ur hse is the nearest..." bein the idiot tt i m... i said out frm no where..." okie okie!!!.. put at my hse k.. settle??" to tink tt i m a hero...nah... it bcame worse... it went on 4 sometim..i walked away..duh!!.. its been very hard 4 mi these few daes.. had some qaurrels at hm... some problem wif "frends"... wait wait wait.. not all was bad actually... i had test results tt were over expectations.... more chances to train durin vb trg... blah blah blah... quite happy i guess... overall... i m feelin on top of da world....

haiz... jus finish my maths hw on algebra... quite okie ba.. not tt tough... .... quite fast finish ya... now feelin quite happy all of a sudden... duno y..aha.. anways... since tis is my blog.. i hafta post pics of myself rite?? i guess so.... hmm... so here it goes ya... dont puke hor...

feelin super fustrated again.. now not bcos of bloggin... but cos of my game .... d2.. i cant achieve wad i wan...sigh... oh well... its okie i guess... hmm..aharrrrrr.. so tired... haha.. i figured a way to lie down n use my com both at the same time ..cool huh... i took a pic of it ya... messy after the shift... mom's goona kill mi if she sees it... heck la... haha... in tis way..i can enjoy the comfort of my bed n use my com at the same time... y not ya?? but it aint a really gd idea after all... mus carry the monitor to the chair... take the mouse n keyboard out blah blah blah... afraid i would drop sometin...ahaahzzz... anyways... enjoy da pics ....cYa

ahhh... jus came back frm trg... phew... tired!!!.. i feel very fustrated... wads tag??? link?? all these blog words r driving me crazy... lucky for me.. a few ppl came to my rescue... now i noe wad it is... bud how do i imput it in my blog... i wonder???.... haiz... confused.... very confused... prayin hard for a kind soul to teach mi....

haha... time now 4.15am... how did i wake up at tis time... i haf no idea... Cant go back to sleep, feeling recharged. hahazzz.. anyways, i m still lost n totally unfamilar wif tis bloggin tin yea.. hopin patienly tt some1 wld teach me... hehe... i wana import pics.. got many pics to show every1, haiz.. y so difficult??!!!

todae was a wonderful dae i guess... fun n excitment throughout the whole dae... woke up early in da mornin to play game .. heres a pic of it anyway... not long after..had to rush to meet my frendz... we made out way down to chc (city harvest church). I mus sae... its a cool place... very grand n simply a notch above above everytin... had worship n all tt stuff... wow... the speaker was wonderful... learnt many things yup... after the service... we joined victoria's cellgroup for lunch at ntu... all of us were shy... kinda anti-social... we met many familar faces there... lee ling, glenys, tiffany blah blah blah... finally after lunch... kevin and the rest of us decided to catch a movie... running low on $$cash$$..i decided not to follow them. I went back home soon after.. haiz...boRiN... anyways.. tis is my first eva blog... kinda unfamilar wif it... oh well... haf to try it out to c wad more can i do wif it... gotta giv thanks to ling ya for introducing 2 mi tis bloggin tingi...haha... so long for now.... cYa
